  16. /* Machine-dependent interface with the asm code */

  18. #ifndef CAML_STACK_H
  19. ‌#define CAML_STACK_H

  21. #ifdef CAML_INTERNALS

  23. /* Macros to access the stack frame */

  25. #ifdef TARGET_power
  26. #if defined(MODEL_ppc)
  27. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) - 4))
  28. #elif defined(MODEL_ppc64)
  29. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) + 16))
  30. #elif defined(MODEL_ppc64le)
  31. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) + 16))
  32. #else
  33. #error "TARGET_power: wrong MODEL"
  34. #endif
  35. ‌#define Already_scanned(sp, retaddr) ((retaddr) & 1)
  36. ‌#define Mask_already_scanned(retaddr) ((retaddr) & ~1)
  37. ‌#define Mark_scanned(sp, retaddr) Saved_return_address(sp) = (retaddr) | 1
  38. #endif

  40. #ifdef TARGET_s390x
  41. ‌#define Wosize_gc_regs (2 + 9 /* int regs */ + 16 /* float regs */)
  42. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) - SIZEOF_PTR))
  43. ‌#define Pop_frame_pointer(sp)
  44. #endif

  46. #ifdef TARGET_amd64
  47. /* Size of the gc_regs structure, in words.
  48.    See amd64.S and amd64/proc.ml for the indices */
  49. ‌#define Wosize_gc_regs (13 /* int regs */ + 16 /* float regs */)
  50. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) - 8))
  51. #ifdef WITH_FRAME_POINTERS
  52. ‌#define Pop_frame_pointer(sp) (sp) += sizeof(value)
  53. #else
  54. ‌#define Pop_frame_pointer(sp)
  55. #endif
  56. #endif

  58. #ifdef TARGET_arm64
  59. /* Size of the gc_regs structure, in words.
  60.    See arm64.S and arm64/proc.ml for the indices */
  61. ‌#define Wosize_gc_regs (2 + 24 /* int regs */ + 24 /* float regs */)
  62. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) - 8))
  63. ‌#define Pop_frame_pointer(sp) sp += sizeof(value)
  64. #endif

  66. #ifdef TARGET_riscv
  67. /* Size of the gc_regs structure, in words.
  68.    See riscv.S and riscv/proc.ml for the indices */
  69. ‌#define Wosize_gc_regs (2 + 22 /* int regs */ + 20 /* float regs */)
  70. ‌#define Saved_return_address(sp) *((intnat *)((sp) - 8))
  71. /* RISC-V does not use a frame pointer, but requires the stack to be
  72.    16-aligned, so when pushing the return address to the stack there
  73.    is an extra word of padding after it that needs to be skipped when
  74.    walking the stack. */
  75. ‌#define Pop_frame_pointer(sp) sp += sizeof(value)
  76. #endif

  78. /* Declaration of variables used in the asm code */
  79. extern value * caml_globals[];
  80. extern intnat caml_globals_inited;

  82. #endif /* CAML_INTERNALS */

  84. #endif /* CAML_STACK_H */
